paragraphs: Book added by Dawnfang & Duskfang from the Creation Club

I know that there is no power that will stop them from taking you away from me and into battle upon foreign fields, for I understand that this is your duty as captain of the Blades. As your wife, I should respect such things. Nevertheless, the feat that you may never return troubles me.
Know that I think of you always. We are bound together, in this life and in the next.
